Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 82 off 53 balls.
Arshdeep Singh took 3 wickets for 32 runs.
Hardik Pandya took 3 wickets for 30 runs.
India won by 4 wickets with 0 balls remaining.
India needed 48 runs off the last three overs.
Virat Kohli hit two sixes in the 19th over.
Mohammad Nawaz bowled the final over, which included a no-ball and a wide.
R Ashwin hit the winning runs with a chip over mid-off.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised Virat Kohli's innings as one of India's best.
Virat Kohli described his innings as his best T20 innings due to the magnitude of the game and the situation.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in front of more than 90,000 fans at the MCG.
Pakistan's morale remained intact despite the loss.
Arshdeep Singh made crucial new-ball incisions to remove both Pakistan openers.
